Stage 2.description: {{sl.actors.0}} stands behind {{sl.actors.1}}, who is facing away, as {{sl.actors.0}} makes contact with {{sl.actors.1}}'s mammary glands using one hand during physical contact and makes contact with {{sl.actors.1}}'s chin using the other hand during physical contact.

Stage 4.description: {{sl.actors.0}} stands behind {{sl.actors.1}}, who is facing away from {{sl.actors.0}}, as {{sl.actors.0}} makes contact with {{sl.actors.1}}'s mammary glands using one hand during physical contact while making contact with the back of {{sl.actors.1}}'s neck using the other hand during physical contact.

Stage 3.description: {{sl.actors.0}} stands behind {{sl.actors.1}}, who is also standing but facing away from {{sl.actors.0}}, as {{sl.actors.0}} makes contact with {{sl.actors.1}}'s mammary glands using one hand during physical contact while making contact with {{sl.actors.1}}'s chin using the other hand during physical contact.

Stage 5.description: {{sl.actors.0}} stands behind {{sl.actors.1}}, who has back to {{sl.actors.0}}, as {{sl.actors.0}} makes contact with {{sl.actors.1}}'s mammary glands using one hand during physical contact while making contact with {{sl.actors.1}}'s neck using the other hand during physical contact.

Stage 1.description: {{sl.actors.0}} is standing, making contact with {{sl.actors.1}}'s mammary glands using both hands during physical contact while {{sl.actors.1}} stands opposite {{sl.actors.0}}.
